name: Wizards Spell
description:
Many years ago, Isluidir the Wizard had great power, before an Evil Wizard came from afar to do battle. When a slave stole Isluidir's spell book, he had no hope of victory, and was doomed to a life of imprisonment. You are his only hope - he offers great riches if you can return his spells. You are assisted on your journey by the Wizard's friend Zod, who will offer advice and encouragement.

Wizards Spell (sic) is a text adventure with graphics, in which half the screen is taken up by visual representations of the surroundings. The player input text commands in order to interact with the environment, solve puzzles, and advance the story. Movement is performed by inputting commands that correspond to the four directions; locations contain descriptions which specify the available exits.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
